name: The Broken Kingdom
description: A once-prosperous kingdom lies in ruins after a devastating war. The old order has collapsed, and now mercenaries, bandits, and desperate survivors fight over the scraps. Ancient powers are stirring, and dark omens haunt the land.
starting_location_description: A weathered inn at the intersection of the old trade roads. It's one of the few safe havens left in the borderlands, run by a grizzled veteran named Torven who asks no questions.

opening_scene.narration_template:
Rain hammers against the shutters of the Crossroads Inn as you sit nursing a cup of watered wine. The common room is nearly empty—just a few huddled travelers and Torven behind the bar, polishing glasses with practiced indifference.

You've been on the road for weeks, following rumors and half-truths. {origin_context}

The door crashes open. A figure stumbles in, cloaked and bleeding. They collapse against a table, gasping: "Please... they're coming. You have to warn—" Their eyes widen, fixed on something behind you. You spin around.

The back door hangs open. Shadows move in the rain beyond.

origin_context.street_urchin: The streets taught you to survive, but they never taught you what to do when the whole world crumbles. You're looking for a score, a way out, or maybe just a reason to keep moving.
origin_context.veteran: The war took everything—your unit, your home, your certainty. You've been drifting since discharge, unable to shake the feeling that something worse than the war is coming.
origin_context.acolyte: Your temple fell to raiders three months ago. Since then, you've followed visions and omens, seeking answers in the ruins of this broken land. Tonight, those visions led you here.

suggested_actions: Rush to help the wounded stranger
Draw your weapon and face the shadows
Demand answers from the stranger before acting

setting_details.tone: Gritty fantasy with hints of cosmic horror

starting_threads.name: The Wounded Messenger
starting_threads.description: A mysterious figure warned of pursuers before collapsing. What were they running from? What message did they carry?

starting_flags.description: The old kingdom has fallen, leaving chaos and opportunity
Something ancient and terrible is awakening
The Crossroads Inn is currently a safe refuge

starting_cast.name: Torven
starting_cast.description: Grizzled veteran who runs the Crossroads Inn. Seen too much to be surprised by anything.
